feed.title: Category: Hacks | Justin's Words of Random

entry.title: Eat24 coupons the dirty way
entry.content:
I've been using Eat24 a lot recently to order food and they always seems to have coupons on their Facebook page.

Here's a one-liner to get the latest coupons. Simply fill in your access token:

bash curl https://graph.facebook.com/eat24/feed?access_token={your_token} \ | python -mjson.tool | grep "coupon code '" \ | sed -r "s/.*code '([a-z]+)'.*/\1/g" | sort | uniq
